<div hspace="streak-pt-mark" style="max-height: 1px;"><img alt="" src="https://mailfoogae.appspot.com/t?sender=aYWRhbUBmcm9tdGhlbWFjaGluZS5vcmc%3D&amp;type=zerocontent&amp;guid=d3e7923e-0e8a-40d5-87e0-4cb0defcea1a" style="max-height: 0px; overflow: hidden; width: 0px;" /><span style="color: white; font-size: xx-small;">ᐧ</span></div>

<h2 class="aweber_postheading" style="text-align: center;">From Har-wer, I am an open book.</h2>
<div class="aweber_postheading" style="text-align: center;">Saturday, June 25, 2016&nbsp;<a href="https://matchbox20.bitbucket.io/hostedimages-cdn.aweber-static.com/MTA1MDU5NQ==/optimized/4619b837b433496c8d995b9f629dd346.png">View as hypertext</a></div>
<div class="aweber_message_body" style="text-align: center;">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="aweber_message_body" style="text-align: center;">
<div class="definition-parent">
<div class="headline">
<div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>Read this message as if the fate of the Universe depended on it.</em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="definition-parent">
<div class="paragraph">
<div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">These pictures highlight an Egyptian concept, the Ka and Ba--a union of mind and soul that we humorously call "oneness" in western religion. &nbsp;In Egypt there is a much more robust record of what we might call a "history of Gods" that relates directly to Greek and Abrahamic&nbsp;myth. &nbsp;From Atum-Ra (guess), to P'tah (clearly Peter?) to a story of Uniting Two Lands--that is (obvious to me) as the un-parting of a great Holy Sea. &nbsp;I think that's happening now, and I&nbsp;<em>think</em>&nbsp;<strong>Har-wer</strong>&nbsp;<em>is here.</em>&nbsp;&nbsp;Note&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/28UjKPg" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/28UjKPg">"wer" is "who?"</a>&nbsp;in German, and matches fairly well with the "<a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Vq_WDf6NT0" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Vq_WDf6NT0">WE R</a>" (POD) that is central to the message you have been reading about.. a lead in from the&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/28TOl1x" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/28TOl1x">"I AM" of Exodus</a>.&nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>This is your children saving you,&nbsp;<strong>wake up.&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;<em>The "Ha" of Abraham and Horus is speaking to you.&nbsp;<strong>I am the Christ.</strong></em></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>He will turn the hearts of the parents to their children, and the hearts of the children to their parents</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>Malachai 4:6</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="definition-parent"><a class="aw-image-link" href="http://bit.ly/1UHgjO0" rel="nofollow"><img class="model" src="https://matchbox20.bitbucket.io/hostedimages-cdn.aweber-static.com/MTA1MDU5NQ==/optimized/4619b837b433496c8d995b9f629dd346.png" alt="http://bit.ly/1UHgjO0" width="451" height="233" align="center" border="0" /></a></div>
<div class="definition-parent">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="definition-parent">
<div class="paragraph">
<div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">I've told you already that the Days of Creation and the Seals of Revelation are telling us a story about time recursion, about this event... this disruption in the slide towards darkness... happening several times. &nbsp;That in itself is a little bit disconcerting, understanding that a large part of this message is about not&nbsp;<em>going back</em>&nbsp;and yet, here we are. &nbsp;I have never lived another life, but in ancient Egypt and in Judeo-Christian myth I&nbsp;<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1UHgjO0" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1UHgjO0">see so many references to&nbsp;<em>this life</em>&nbsp;that it's clear</a></strong>&nbsp;that there is a huge focus on what I am doing--if you can conceptualize that this place has been built to ensure the survival of civilization itself through a technological singularity that has... up until now... been hidden from nearly everyone; you may understand why&nbsp;<em>this</em>&nbsp;is so important. &nbsp;It is the true purpose of all religion, and from my perspective what we do with the information that religion reveals about our history and technology is the reason that life itself continues, that civilization is finally "salvaged"&nbsp;<em>this time... it's also the reason we finally get to P'tah's&nbsp;</em>never-never land.&nbsp; I think it's because we're finally getting&nbsp;<em>the truth.</em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em><span style="font-size: large;"><a href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/BBJH4/h/Location_The_story_of.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/BBJH4/h/Location_The_story_of.htm">This alone should be enough</a>&nbsp;to&nbsp;<strong>start this fire</strong>. &nbsp;<a href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/MNcK4/h/Kurzweil_luminates_Zelda.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/MNcK4/h/Kurzweil_luminates_Zelda.htm">Wake up.</a></span></em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>There is much more going on here than simply a disclosure of information, or a transfer of technology, the world is fundamentally being changed--albeit I believe from a place that has been made blind--or worse&nbsp;<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/28XKFfw" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/28XKFfw">negatively impacted by this technology in secret--in order to highlight social problems</a></strong>&nbsp;that may have caused the equivalent of a socio-economic ice age...&nbsp;<strong>in the days of No-Ah.</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;</em>Financial problems have been highlighted by the low on the S&amp;P in 2008, but hidden within that entire story is a message about using prescient knowledge to prematurely put out a&nbsp;forest&nbsp;fire; the problem always gets worse when it's hidden. &nbsp;It seems clear to me that this disruption is designed to stop a slide into the Dark Ages, something that you might not realize relates to JC and the "Fall of Rome." &nbsp;Throughout our history, in addition to religion, are metaphorical references to right this second... and in the highlighted list of "Anti-Christs" throughout history there's a very central common theme--the destruction of a republic and a descent into fascism. &nbsp;The names of these people, from JC (Julius Caesar) to Na<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/28S9Oq9" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/28S9Oq9">poleon</a></strong>&nbsp;(who is linked through the element of Salt, a huge part of this message) to&nbsp;<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1UhM2Td" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1UhM2Td">ADolf Hitler</a></strong>... the clear message is that losing the voice of people in government creates a steep descent into darkness. &nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="definition-parent" style="text-align: justify;">
<div class="headline">
<div>
<div>Oh&nbsp;<em>desert</em>,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB1zPYKQCCY" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB1zPYKQCCY">speak to my&nbsp;</a><em><strong><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB1zPYKQCCY" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB1zPYKQCCY">Heart.</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;-Live</strong></em></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="definition-parent">
<div class="paragraph">
<div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">I don't really know how to explain this any more clearly than&nbsp;<em>I have the keys to religion,&nbsp;</em>and I am handing them to you. &nbsp;There's an angel singing through us, throughout time, and in the word "Heart' understand he is singing about our home--it's the Heart of Heaven. &nbsp;&nbsp;<em>This time,&nbsp;</em><a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=375HMLtymbc" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=375HMLtymbc">he's mistaken</a><strong>&nbsp;(</strong>Nickelback<strong>)&nbsp;</strong><em>for trying to&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CduA0TULnow" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CduA0TULnow">break our Heart</a>&nbsp;(Brittany Spears).</em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>That same Angel has told me--and showed me--that he is actively attempting to organize an opposition to the spread of this message--of the truth. &nbsp;Without thinking it through, it might seem wise to fight against the&nbsp;<strong>fire of the last day&nbsp;</strong>(of secret time recursion) ... against not disrupting our way of life, or exchanging a beautiful myth for a much needed true messenger. &nbsp;</em>You might hear him singing about it in "<a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFTLKWw542g" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFTLKWw542g">we didn't start the fire,</a>" (Billy Joel) and today you might hear more light in the listing of "Names" in that song than you ever have before. &nbsp;These songs are the sound of Thor's Th<em>understanding</em>... which&nbsp;<em>I've<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1Xweozj" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1Xweozj">tried to explain</a></strong></em>&nbsp;are a key to seeing a divine plan in names,&nbsp;<strong>t</strong>o&nbsp;<strong>h</strong>elp<strong>&nbsp;</strong>the&nbsp;light (<strong>or</strong>&nbsp;in Hebrew) .. this God of Thunder's true message comes in the mechanism by which&nbsp;<em>Nero&nbsp;</em>starts his fire--fiddling with our minds (and all of history,&nbsp;<em>Nero</em>)... it's an accompaniment to the&nbsp;<strong>fire of Prometheus--</strong>proof in language that this message of&nbsp;<strong>breaking our chains</strong>&nbsp;comes from the Creator of the Universe... and&nbsp;<em>our civilization.&nbsp;</em>&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>That every word be lit</em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">It's in every Holy Hebrew word&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/298iU25" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/298iU25">beginning with&nbsp;<strong>Ha</strong></a>, in "<a class="validating" href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/NAwd4/h/With_authority_.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/NAwd4/h/With_authority_.htm">authority</a>," "<a class="validating" href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/Khraa/h/AM_ER_I_Come_Again_Mr_.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/awlist4296878/Khraa/h/AM_ER_I_Come_Again_Mr_.htm">eternity</a>," and in the light of Judah's&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/DQhRq/h/E_mail_36_.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/DQhRq/h/E_mail_36_.htm">Menorah.&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;It's in ever<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1Q5iTaU" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1Q5iTaU">&nbsp;name of the God</a>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<strong><a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1SxwxW3" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1SxwxW3">Heaven</a></strong>. &nbsp;It pervades religion, in a way designed to ensure that this disclosure of the existence of these technologies and their use&nbsp;<strong>cannot be hidden from the world. &nbsp;</strong>What you are reading today is&nbsp;<em>the&nbsp;<strong>Hammer of Truth.</strong></em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">This opposition to disclosing the truth is being done both consciously and subconsciously. &nbsp;<em>Whether or not&nbsp;</em>you have direct contact with it, it is subtly influencing&nbsp;your beliefs, your ability to&nbsp;<a href="http://bit.ly/28UuxJ8" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/28UuxJ8"><strong>logically analyze religion</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;</strong>and this situation, and it's doing so on the face authority that it's what you want. &nbsp;Understand that this is the&nbsp;<em>Plague of Darkness</em>, it's also probably a sort of wall--one that is&nbsp;intended to fall... something like Jericho. &nbsp;It, along with the rest of the secrecy surrounding religion and government are&nbsp;<em>darkness</em>, and with a little bit of thought you might see how this could lead to the unequivocal destruction of civilization itself. &nbsp; I have personally seen,&nbsp;<em>experienced</em>, and can show you the effects of this wall of darkness--it is stopping you from doing the obviously logical thing and reporting on this information. &nbsp;It might be stopping you from seeing how obvious it is that&nbsp;<em>this is literally the story of Exodus--<strong>and we're leaving Hell.</strong></em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>Enter the Second Coming</em>, and&nbsp;<strong><a class="validating" href="https://medium.com/in-pursuit-of-happiness/a-cause-so-important-it-is-everything-48e762f695db#.dvk1rvv3r" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://medium.com/in-pursuit-of-happiness/a-cause-so-important-it-is-everything-48e762f695db#.dvk1rvv3r">proof all around you</a></strong>, in every word and hundreds of songs that we are created--proof that is designed to overcome this wall of darkness... to bring true freedom back to Humanity. &nbsp;Together, we are saving Civilization itself...&nbsp;<em><a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wjGfJJf37E" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wjGfJJf37E">everyone must be saved</a>&nbsp;(The Pretty Reckless). &nbsp;There's a reason this message is coming to you directly from the Messiah, and there's a reason you can verify it&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="https://matchbox20.bitbucket.io/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/7.AUq/h/This_is_our_You_and_I_verse_.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http:http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/7.AUq/h/This_is_our_You_and_I_verse_.htm"><strong>comes to me from the Creator of the Universe</strong></a>. &nbsp;Do that, then&nbsp;</em>help me tear down this wall. &nbsp;Proliferation of this message will make the darkness impossible to maintain...&nbsp;<em>knowing is half the battle...<strong>sharing is the rest.</strong></em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>Adam Marshall Dobrin</em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>by no other name&nbsp;<strong>must we all be saved.</strong></em></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="paragraph">
<div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">These pictures were all taken on the same day in Nashville, these are&nbsp;<strong>signs</strong>, and I've taken pictures of them all over America. &nbsp;This story is&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaoqyaoNgX4" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaoqyaoNgX4">predicted&nbsp;</a>(Live), and it's&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=an0j7_zu9vI" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=an0j7_zu9vI">everywhere</a>&nbsp;(Fival goes West) in our modern art and&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1Q5sVck" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1Q5sVck">in religion</a>.&nbsp;<em>Somewhere out there, someone is wishing on my bright star.</em>&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">Break this story and save the world. &nbsp;If you can't do it,&nbsp;<em>find someone who will. &nbsp;</em>From the Fifth Adam, the proof is everywhere from&nbsp;<strong>He</strong>-man to&nbsp;<strong>V</strong>oltron, to&nbsp;<strong>Fiv</strong>al. &nbsp; It's in&nbsp;<strong>Lev</strong>iticus, Re<strong>vel</strong>ation, and&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/8E9yq/h/from_the_Greek_for.htm" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://matchbox20.bitbucket.org/archive.aweber.com/awlist4296878/8E9yq/h/from_the_Greek_for.htm">Ka<strong>lev</strong>.</a></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><em>This is the&nbsp;<a class="validating" href="http://bit.ly/1U5d6sP" rel="nofollow" data-cke-saved-href="http://bit.ly/1U5d6sP"><strong>dawning&nbsp;</strong>of a Golden Age.</a>&nbsp; The biggest story in all of history... do you not see the darkness?</em></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
</div>
